detail_desc: Bikini briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is recycled.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and string back. The polyamide content of the briefs is recycled.

Wide, ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey crêpe with a concealed zip in the side and straight-cut legs with sewn-in creases front and back.

Calf-length jersey dress with a wrapover front, deep V-neck and a seam at the waist with pleats that go all the way round. Yoke at the back, a press-stud fastening at the waist, dropped shoulders and long, tapered sleeves. Unlined.

Top in soft, stretch viscose jersey with a wide neckline, long dolman sleeves and a visible seam down the front and back.

Fitted, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, adjustable tabs with press-studs at the sides and zipped side pockets. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Lined.

Long trenchcoat in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, draped lapels at the front and a loose yoke at the back. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and no buttons. Unlined.

Bomber jacket in patterned satin with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated hem. Chiffon lining.
Rib-knit joggers with a lightly brushed finish and an elasticated drawstring waist.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Short, sleeveless V-neck dress in an airy jacquard weave containing glittery threads. Flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders, a gathered section under the bust, concealed zip and button at the back, and a seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Satin lining.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved all-in-one-suit in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved all-in-one-suit in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved all-in-one-suit in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from patterned organic cotton. Press-stud on one shoulder and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Baby Exclusive. Round-necked dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from patterned organic cotton. Press-studs at the neck, long balloon sleeves with ribbing and a gathered seam at the top.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in stretch organic cotton twill with adjustable straps that fasten at the front and elastication at the back of the waist. Pockets and fasteners at the sides, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 0-12M.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft jersey made from patterned organic cotton. Press-stud on one shoulder and an open chest pocket.
